column2: "...It is as you saw. They all continue their pointless struggles, believing in your victory."
"They would sacrifice themselves for a nonexistent victory... How utterly amusing."
"...And yet, you still choose to ignore the difference in our abilities and refuse to give up."
"Despite knowing that lust for the unattainable has been the cause of all the evils of history..."
"...Now then, shall we begin? I shall exact my retribution for Varuna and Mitra."
"You will writhe in despair, screaming out in agony as you descend into blackest darkness...and die a painful death for me."
